short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks and logs where you enter your email address.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of where your email address is entered and submitted.

Ever wonder which websites you've shared your email address with while browsing? This extension provides a simple solution!

Add the email addresses you want to monitor in the extension settings, and view detailed logs by clicking the extension icon.

Easily check whether you've only entered your email or also submitted it.

Your log data is securely stored by Google Chrome.

Export or delete your logs whenever you like.
